text: On 15 October 2021, a suicide bombing happened at the Imam Bargah mosque in Kandahar, Afghanistan. The mosque is a Shia mosque. The attack happened during Friday prayers. It killed at least 65 people and injured more than 70 others. The Islamic State â€“ Khorasan Province claimed responsibility for the attack.
